title: Do 52 Thoroughbred Horses Need New Homes Due to COVID-19?
subtitle: A plea that dozens of horses are destined for slaughter if adopters are not found for them soon is inaccurate and long out-of-date.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: 52 thoroughbred horses whose owner died from COVID-19 are destined for slaughter if adopters are not found for them soon.
